alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 1:37PM EST until December 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Vermont, Windsor and Eastern Rutland Counties. In New York, Clinton, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin, and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Isolated to scattered power outages are expected. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur between 9 PM tonight and 5 AM Friday, before gradually weakening through the morning hours on Friday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
